rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {CSE1401, FIT9029, GCO1813, IMS1403, IMS2401, IMS5401, IMS9001, MMS1403, MMS2201}

proh: CSE1401, GCO1813, IMS1403, IMS2401, IMS5401, IMS9001, MMS1403, MMS2201 Translation Set: MMS9405
description: This unit will examine the activities integral to the development of a multimedia systems, detailing the techniques of systems analysis and design used in the development process. Fundamental programming concepts will be introduced within a multimedia scripting language framework as a mechanism for system development. Students will be involved in a mixture of individual and group-based work which will require application of the theoretical knowledge gained in lectures to a series of practical problems in multimedia systems development.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
